title: "Untitled"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
n <- 100
df <- data.frame(
    integers = 1:n,
    letters = sample( letters, n, replace = TRUE ),
    dates = seq.Date( as.Date( "2000-01-01" ), by = 1, length.out = n ),
    posix = seq.POSIXt( as.POSIXct( "2000-01-01 10:00:00" ), by = 1000, length.out = n ),
    itime = setattr( 1:n, "class", "ITime" ),
    logical = sample( c( TRUE, FALSE ), n, replace = T ),
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
```

```{r}
microbenchmark::microbenchmark(
    convert = rcsv::write_rcsv( df, "READMEfiles/rcsv_convert_TRUE.rcsv", strings.convert = TRUE ),
    noconvert = rcsv::write_rcsv( df, "READMEfiles/rcsv_convert_FALSE.rcsv", strings.convert = FALSE ),
    dt.fwrite = fwrite( df, "READMEfiles/fwrite.csv", dateTimeAs = "write.csv" ),
    base.write = write.csv( df, "READMEfiles/base_write.csv" ),
    readr.write = readr::write_csv( df, "READMEfiles/readr_write.csv" ),
times = 10 )
```

```{r}
subset(
    file.info( list.files( "READMEfiles/", full.names = TRUE ) ),
    select = 1
)
```

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
microbenchmark::microbenchmark(
    convert = { foo.convert <- rcsv::read_rcsv( "READMEfiles/rcsv_convert_TRUE.rcsv" ) },
    noconvert = { foo.noconvert <- rcsv::read_rcsv( "READMEfiles/rcsv_convert_FALSE.rcsv" ) },
    dt.fread = { foo.fread <- fread( "READMEfiles/fwrite.csv" ) },
    base.read = { foo.base <- read.csv( "READMEfiles/base_write.csv" ) },
    readr.read = { foo.readr <- readr::read_csv( "READMEfiles/readr_write.csv" ) },
times = 10 )
```
